name: Discretelogix
description: As a Senior Software Engineer, I worked on software and web development using MVC and OOP principles. I contributed to projects like Digitalkeeper (SaaS-based) and EmeetHub (similar to Meetup.com), focusing on PHP frameworks (Laravel, Yii), WordPress, MySQL, and REST API development. I used Amazon Web Services (AWS S3) for storage and integrated PayPal for payment processing. I also worked with front-end technologies like Bootstrap, version control with Git and SVN, and followed Scrum methodologies for project management.
